title: Machina Labs raises $124M to launch large-scale intelligent U.S. factory
description:
Machina Labs designed its intelligent factory to manufacture a wide range of complex metal structures without significant retooling.

The post Machina Labs raises $124M to launch large-scale intelligent U.S. factory appeared first on The Robot Report.
